definition: A piece of furniture or equipment typically found in commercial establishments, where customers make payments for goods or services received. It is commonly used in retail stores, restaurants, and other similar settings.

examples.german: Bitte zahlen Sie an der Kasse.
examples.english: Please pay at the cash register.

examples.german: Ich stehe in der Schlange an der Kasse.
examples.english: I am standing in line at the cash register.
The cash register only accepts cash.

examples.german: Kann ich eine Quittung an der Kasse bekommen?
examples.english: Can I get a receipt at the cash register?
